articles.title: Exclusive: Google Maps is rolling out speedometer, speed limits on iPhone and CarPlay globally - TechCrunch
articles.description: When people start navigation on Google Maps, the vehicle's speed is shown in miles or kilometers, depending on the region.
articles.content:
Google Maps has introduced speedometer and speed limits on iOS and CarPlay more than five years after their debut on Android to help iPhone users avoid speed ticketing while driving.
